articles.title: Speaker Emerita Melissa Hortman, husband shot and killed; Sen. John Hoffman and wife also shot
articles.description: Speaker Emerita Melissa Hortman and her husband have died after they were shot at their home in Brooklyn Park.
articles.content:
Democratic House Speaker Emerita Melissa Hortman and her husband, Mark, were shot and killed Saturday morning at their home in Brooklyn Park in what Gov. Tim Walz called a “politically motivated assassination.”

articles.title: Alas Pilipinas yields to dominant Vietnam, settles for silver in AVC Nations Cup
articles.description: MANILA, Philippines — Alas Pilipinas simply could not keep up with the taller, faster, and more experienced Vietnam team in the final, 15-25, 17-25, 14-25, to settle for a silver medal in the AVC Women's Nations Cup at the Dong Anh Arena on Saturday night.

articles.title: US Democratic politician and husband shot dead
articles.description: A gunman in Minnesota has shot two Democratic state politicians, killing one and her husband and wounding the other in what officials said were targeted attacks.
articles.content:
A gunman in Minnesota has shot two Democratic state politicians, killing one and her husband and wounding the other in what officials said were targeted attacks.

articles.title: Hay fever vs. COVID-19: How to tell the difference
articles.description: Pollen season brings allergy anxiety. Hay fever and COVID-19 share symptoms. Itchy eyes suggest allergy. Fever, loss of taste point to COVID-19. Rapid
articles.content:
The early symptoms
A runny or blocked nose
Sneezing
Sore throat
Tiredness
Headache
Cough (especially from postnasal drip in hay fever)
COVID-19 symptoms
Hay fever is usually more of a face attack
The sneeze test
Taste and smell
